newsitem.title: ROMANIA: Romania launches 500 bln lei treasury-bill issue.
newsitem.headline: Romania launches 500 bln lei treasury-bill issue.

text.p: Romania's finance ministry said it would launch 500 billion lei worth of 91-day treasury bills to finance and refinance a part of 1995's budget deficit.

It said the T-bills' annual yield will equal the three-month Bucharest Interbank Bid Rate (BUBID) set five days ahead of the public subscriptions scheduled for August 29, September 12, October 10 and October 24.
Three-month BUBID rate was 50.11 percent on Thursday.
The T-bills will be placed by the central bank and can be bought by banks and their corporate clients. -- Bucharest Newsroom 40-1 3120264
